feed.title: Bitcoin Core v29.1 release candidate available

entry.title: Bitcoin Core v29.1 release candidate available
entry.summary: The final release of Bitcoin Core 29.1 is now available for users, as indicated by the provided [link](https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-29.1/). This update marks a significant milestone in the development of Bitcoin Core, signifying the culmination of efforts from developers to enhance the software's features, security, and usability. The release underscores the continuous commitment to improving the infrastructure that supports the Bitcoin network, ensuring that it remains secure, efficient, and accessible to users worldwide. By making the update available, the developers aim to provide an improved experience for all stakeholders involved in the Bitcoin ecosystem.
